proj.zoie.api.impl
类 ZoieContext

java.lang.Object
  proj.zoie.api.impl.ZoieContext

public class ZoieContext
extends Object

This class holds the ZoieContext for each thread. Any child thread inherits the context from the parent. The inherited context is a clone of the parent context so that forthcoming changes to the contexts of the parent and the children are independent of each other.

作者：
"Xiaoyang Gu"

方法详细信息

getContext

public static ZoieContext getContext()

setContext

public static void setContext(ZoieContext context)
Set the threadlocal ZoieContext. It always clone it so that the threads won't interfere with each other.

参数：
context -

getReaderContext

public ZoieReaderContext getReaderContext(ZoieIndexReader<?> reader)
Get the context of the given reader for the calling thread.

参数：
reader -
返回：

clone

protected ZoieContext clone()
clone the ZoieContext so that the internal hashmap is deep-copied to the extend that in the clone, the ZoieReaderContexts are clones of the original. Note that the internals of ZoieReaderContexts are shallow copies.

覆盖：
类 Object 中的 clone
另请参见：
Object.clone()

clear

public void clear()
